scripts.clean: echo Deleting the old build... && rm -rf i18n
scripts.translate: echo Starting the new build... && static-i18n --fix-paths false --locales-path www/locales/ -l -i bg -i en www/default
scripts.copyStatic: echo Copying static files... && cp -r www/static/ i18n/
scripts.compileDefault: echo Copmiling default... && cp i18n/en/* i18n/ && sed -i 's/..\/static\//static\//g' i18n/index.html
scripts.build: npm run -s clean && npm run -s translate && npm run -s copyStatic && npm run -s compileDefault && echo Done.
